name: Simplecountdown
0:
”Alexa, start simple countdown”
”Alexa, ask simple countdown to start a countdown at five”
”Alexa, ask simple countdown for ten seconds”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: simple countdown
des: This countdown offers a simple alternative to the countdown provided by Alexa, with the difference that the seconds are counted down loud.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
